title: Red Hat Unalives LibreOffice RPM From RHEL & Fedora
description:
Recently Red Hat decided to end maintainence of the LibreOffice RPM for RHEL and Fedora and whilst that certainly sounds bad, it's nowhere near as bad when you have a read of why.
